entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 11:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -8.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
